verses.roman:
balabhadra bhaṭṭācārya, āra paṇḍita dāmodara
dui-jana-saṅge prabhu āilā nīlācala

synonyms: balabhadra bhaṭṭācārya—of the name Balabhadra Bhaṭṭācārya; āra—and; paṇḍita dāmodara—Dāmodara Paṇḍita; dui-jana—two persons; saṅge—with; prabhu—the Lord; āilā—went back; nīlācala—to Jagannātha Purī.
translation: The two persons who accompanied Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu to Jagannātha Purī [Nīlācala] were Balabhadra Bhaṭṭācārya and Dāmodara Paṇḍita.
